name: Skull Slash
description:
Information:

Skull Slash is the second game I will be publishing onto Itch.io after challenging myself to make a game in a week or so. However, the game is just a prototype for an upcoming project I will be working on within Unity but have decided to publish this small game.

Use your sword and slash some skulls!

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Use your mouse to swing your sword around. 

Further Information:

Sound effects made using bfxr:  http://www.bfxr.net/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/aakashmaIik
